abstract: The billionaire investor wrote in an open letter to shareholders on Tuesday that he had bought half of the stake held by his fellow dissident investor, Southeastern Asset Management. He also demanded that Dell instead begin a tender offer for 1.1 billion shares at $14 apiece.

headline.main: Icahn Increases Stake in Dell and Calls for Stock Buyback

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
